SEARCH
Package camppkg

Interface iCampStaff

All Known Implementing Classes:
CampManager
public interface iCampStaff
Interface for Staff to access camp manager

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      void createCamp(String staffID, String campName, String startDate, String endDate, String registrationClosingDate, boolean openToWholeNTU, Faculty userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description)
      Create camp
      Parameters:
      staffID - Staff ID
      campName - Camp Name
      startDate - Start Date
      endDate - End Date
      registrationClosingDate - Registration closing date
      openToWholeNTU - If open to whole NTU
      userGroup - Faculty of staff
      location - Location
      totalSlots - Total number of slots
      campCommitteeSlots - Number of CC Slots
      description - Description for camp

    • deleteCamp

      void deleteCamp(String campID)
      For Staff to delete a camp. Cannot delete a camp that already has students registered.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp to be deleted.

    • getAllCamps

      ArrayList<String> getAllCamps()
      Returns a list of IDs of all camps in the system.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of campID in the system

    • getCreatedCamps

      ArrayList<String> getCreatedCamps(String staffID)
      Get the camps created by a Staff. Staff can create multiple camps.
      Parameters:
      staffID - Staff's userID based on login credentials.
      Returns:
      ArrayList object of camps created.

    • editDate

      void editDate(String campID, String startDate, String endDate)
      Edit the start and end dates of a camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      startDate - new camp starting date to set to
      endDate - new camp ending date to set to

    • editRegistrationClosingDate

      void editRegistrationClosingDate(String campID, String registrationClosingDate)
      Edit the registration closing date of a camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      registrationClosingDate - new camp registration closing date to set to

    • setVisibility

      void setVisibility(String campID, boolean visiblity)
      Edit the visibility of a camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      visiblity - new visibility to set to

    • editOpenTo

      void editOpenTo(String campID, boolean openToWholeNTU)
      Edit the target student group who can join.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      openToWholeNTU - if the student group is the whole of NTU, or just the Faculty

    • editLocation

      void editLocation(String campID, String location)
      Edit the location of the camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      location - new location of the camp.

    • editSlots

      void editSlots(String campID, String roleID, int totalSlots)
      Edit the total number of slots for a particular role of a camp. Cannot set it to be lower than the number of students already registered for the role.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      roleID - ID of the role to be edited
      totalSlots - total number of slots to be set

    • editCampCommitteeSlots

      void editCampCommitteeSlots(String campID, int campCommitteeSlots)
      Edit the total number of slots for Camp Committee Members of a camp. Cannot set it to be lower than the number of students already registered for the role.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      campCommitteeSlots - total number of slots to be set

    • editDescription

      void editDescription(String campID, String description)
      Edit the description for the camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - campID of the target camp.
      description - the new description of the camp

    • getRegisteredStudents

      ArrayList<String> getRegisteredStudents(String campID)
      Returns a list of students registered for a camp Accessible only for Camp Committee Members and Staff overseeing the camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the target camp
      Returns:
      ArrayList of StudentID

    • getRegisteredStudentRoles

      HashMap<String,String> getRegisteredStudentRoles(String campID)
      Returns a list of students registered for a camp and their associated roles Accessible only for Camp Committee Members and Staff overseeing the camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the target camp
      Returns:
      HashMap of StudentID and their associated RoleID
